title: FAHIZO Men's White Tuxedo Shirt with Wing Collar, French Cuffs & Accessories
description: [Complete Outfit] This ensemble includes a stylish French shirt, metal cuff links, a bow tie, and an exquisite lapel pin, all of which combine to create a cohesive look.
[Premium Fabric] The shirt is made of 12% viscose from modal and 88% microfiber from polyester, offering unmatched breathability, durability, and wrinkle resistance for all-day comfort.

[Regular Fit] Modern fit with a tapered body and slimmer sleeves for a sleek look that flatters most body shapes. Please kindly take a note of our size chart and size video for choosing the best size.

[Wide Capability] Classic and elegant style will let you look best at party, wedding, date, vacation, business meetings, daily casual, stage, etc. It also a perfect gift for families, friends, colleagues, and boyfriend.

[Easy to Care] Hand wash or Machine washable. Wash separately or with similar colors In cold water. Line (hang) dry And use a warm iron If Needed. The fabric is well built that can hold up well after washing.
